name: AutoWorkServices
title: Auto Work Services
description: Auto Work Services codes for insurance operations.

concept.display: Selling or servicing automobile parts and accessories
concept.definition: Business operations involving the retail sale or maintenance of vehicle components and accessories including aftermarket upgrades, replacement parts, and vehicle enhancement products.

designation.value: Vente ou entretien de pièces et d'accessoires automobiles
Venta o mantenimiento de piezas y accesorios de automóviles

concept.definition: Specialized services for vehicles with enhanced power output, racing capabilities, or sport-tuned components that typically require specialized expertise and parts.
Repair and replacement services for exhaust systems, transmission assemblies, and engine cooling systems.
Services for windshield replacement, window repair, and other automotive glass installation including chip repair and crack fixing.
Maintenance and repair of braking systems and suspension components including pads, rotors, shocks, struts, and alignment services.

designation.value: Réparation des freins et de la suspension

concept.display: Air conditioning, radiator or electrical repair
concept.definition: Services for climate control systems, cooling system maintenance, and electrical system diagnostics and repair including wiring, batteries, and alternators.

designation.value: Climatisation, radiateur ou réparation d'appareil électrique
Aire acondicionado, radiador o reparación eléctrica

concept.definition: Professional cleaning and restoration services including interior and exterior deep cleaning, waxing, polishing, and paint correction.
Manual vehicle washing services performed by hand rather than automated systems.
Automated vehicle washing facilities where vehicles pass through mechanical washing equipment.
Regular maintenance services including engine oil replacement, filter changes, and lubrication of vehicle components.
Tire-related services including sales, installation, balancing, rotation, and repair.
Diagnostic and repair services for internal combustion engines including rebuilds and component replacement.
Collision repair, dent removal, rust treatment, and automotive painting and refinishing services.
Services for repairing or replacing vehicle interior components including seats, carpets, headliners, and trim.
Vehicle recovery and transportation services for disabled or impounded vehicles.
